description.english: Beat Buyathlon challenge without shooting more than 55 lasers
description.german: Bezwinge die „Biathlon“-Herausforderung und schieße dabei nur 55 Laser ab
description.french: Terminez le défi Fricathlon sans tirer plus de 55 lasers
description.italian: Completa la sfida Spesathlon sparando non più di 55 laser
description.koreana: 바이애슬론 챌린지에서 레이저를 55번 이하로 쏘고 승리하기
description.spanish: Supera el desafío Compratlón sin disparar más de 55 láseres
description.schinese: 在射击不超过55束激光的情况下，通关“剁手竞赛”挑战。
description.russian: Пройти испытание «Биатлон покупок», используя не более 55 лазеров

description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio Compratona sem atirar mais de 55 lasers

description.english: Score over 800m in Run For It challenge without tripping on hurdles
description.german: Erreiche mehr als 800m in der „Renn um dein Leben“-Herausforderung, ohne über Hürden zu stolpern

description.italian: Percorri almeno 800m nella sfida Corsa folle senza inciampare tra gli ostacoli
description.koreana: 광란의 질주 챌린지에서 장애물에 걸려 넘어지지 않고 800m 이상을 달성하기
description.spanish: Consigue más de 800m en el desafío Lánzate sin tropezar con obstáculos
description.schinese: 在“奔跑吧”环节挑战中得分超过800m，且未被障碍绊倒
description.russian: Пробежать более 800m в испытании «Уноси ноги», не споткнувшись о барьеры
description.japanese: ハードルにつまづかないで、「ひたすら走れ」チャレンジで 800m 以上きろくする
description.brazilian: Pontue mais de 800m no desafio Corra sem tropeçar em obstáculos

description.english: Beat Duck Dive challenge without getting knocked out
description.german: Bezwinge die „Durchtauchen“-Herausforderung ohne K.o. zu gehen
description.french: Terminez le défi Grand plongeon sans vous faire assommer
description.italian: Vinci la sfida Duck dive senza farti mettere al tappeto
description.koreana: 오리 다이빙 챌린지에서 쓰러지지 않고 승리하기
description.spanish: Supera el desafío De coco sin que te derriben
description.schinese: 在没有被击倒的情况下，通关“潜越”挑战。
description.russian: Пройти испытание «Проныра» и постараться не выбыть
description.japanese: きぜつしないで、「ダックダイブ」チャレンジをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio Mergulho de Pato sem ser derrubado

description.english: Score over 150m in Head In The Clouds challenge without grabbing the balloon

description.spanish: Completa el desafío Prueba de lanzamiento sin coger la pelota

description.english: Beat Blast Off challenge without your hands exploding
